title: Eddie Jones warns England to expect a bruising battle with South Africa in the Rugby World Cup final
text:
England head coach, Eddie Jones, is preparing his players to face a full-bloodied physical assault from South Africa in the World Cup final in Yokohama on Saturday. Jones has insider knowledge of the type of rugby that is ingrained in the Springbok psyche from his time as technical consultant to their World Cup-winning side of 2007, likening it to ‘coming through the front door at you.’

Little has changed down the generations as was shown in the attritional tactics used by South Africa to overcome Wales in Sunday’s tensely-fought semi-final that set up a repeat of that final at the Stade de France in Paris 12 years ago. England do not begin their preparations in earnest until Tuesday but on the...
description: England head coach, Eddie Jones, is preparing his players to face a full-bloodied physical assault from South Africa in the World Cup final in Yokohama on Saturday.
